template.name: Viper Fragment
template.description: It creates a Viper-managed Fragment bound to empty implementation of ViperFragmentPresenter with appropriate Contract and relatives - Interactor and Routing.

parameter.name: Fragment name
parameter.help: The name of the Viper-managed Fragment class to create

parameter.name: Create ViewHelper for advanced Android transitions?
parameter.help: Create ViewHelper that allows Routing accessing Fragment android.Views to allow Routing perform advanced transitions.

parameter.name: Enable ViewState handling
parameter.help: Add ViewState handling by inheriting from Mosby-based ViewStateFragment

parameter.name: Enable packaging per use case?
parameter.help: If true, classes will be created in single package, if false, classes will be created in packages per VIPER elements
